plants.name: Tomatoes
plants.plantingzone: Plant next to Potatoe varieties and cabbage if possible
plants.growinfo: These need full sun, and to be planted in a well drained area.

plants.name: Potatoes
plants.plantingzone: These flourish around any number of other veegetables, recommended to keep them around other tubing plants
plants.growinfo: Potatoes wil grow best in full sunlight, also require well drained soil.
plants.whentogrow: Plant your potatoes in March, April or May for best results.

plants.name: Boxwood
plants.plantingzone: Plant these as shrubs next to your home or business.
plants.growinfo: These enjoy hot sunlight and require a decent draining area (plant using woodchips)

plants.name: Cabbage
plants.plantingzone: Plant in an area that receives up to 6 hours of sunlight.
plants.growinfo: Plant in a mix of soil and compost for best results and full leaves.

plants.name: Cucumber
plants.plantingzone: Plant on trellace or fence, somewhere it can spread
plants.growinfo: Good Drainage and Sunlight. This is a vine.

plants.name: Carrotts
plants.growinfo: Plant in a mix of loose sandy soil for best results

comments.title: Tomato health
comments.comment: My tomatoes died after two weeks, must have not given them enough water
